Component.Description: Composes a multi-channel array from several single-channel arrays or inserts a single channel into the array.

Property.Description: Determines the channel sequence of the reconstructed images.

Defines whether the reconstructed image will be planar-oriented or pixel-oriented.
Example for RGB images:
Planar oriented images are organized as follows:
RRRR....
GGGG....
BBBB....
Pixel-oriented images are organized as follows:
RGBRGB...
RGBRGB...
RGBRGB...

Input.Description: First image with channel 1 data. This image has to be declared as a 1 channel GRAY image.
First image with channel 2 data. This image has to be declared as a 1 channel GRAY image.
First image with channel 3 data. This image has to be declared as a 1 channel GRAY image.
